issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Re-organize errors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10331](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10331). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
DataFusion's errors do not have much love these days, and I think that they need a lift. For example,
 \* we use "General" very often
 \* the error is called "ExecutionError", even though sometimes it happens during planning
 \* the error "InvalidColumn" is not being used
 \* There is not much documentation about the errors

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10331?focusedCommentId=17218100) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8481
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8481>
